name: Shamhat: The Holy Circlet
overview: Shamhat: The Holy Circlet is an Adventure game, developed and published by DataWest, which was released in Japan in 1993. An adventure game based on the Epic of Gilgamesh. As it is just touted as "DAPS POLYGON ADVENTURE", it is characterized by the fact that the towns and ruins that are the stage of DAPS animation and games are drawn with polygons. * DAPS (Datawest Active Picture System) is the world's first commercial video system.
